Content.Text:
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Did you scratch your elbow? You're bleeding!
Hold still, now...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>That should do it. ...Hmm? How was I able to
treat that so quickly, you ask? Well, because I'm
a nurse!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, I haven't introduced myself yet, have I? My
name is <BLUE>Angela</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
I heard about you from my mother-- er, the
Guild Master.
<PAGE>
Since we're neighbors now, I'm sure I'll be
seeing you around. Until next time!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Hope you're not
working too hard!
<PAGE>
If you get sick, I'm the one who has to take care
of you, after all.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you had breakfast yet? It's the most
important meal of the day, you know...along
with the other two.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. What brings you here so early
today?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. Did you need something? Please make it
quick, if so. I'm very busy, being a nurse in a
village with more hoes than people!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. ...Okay, I'll bite. Why are you staring at
me? Is there something on my face?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. How are you this fine day?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. You certainly seem wide awake
and full of energy right now! But then, you're
always like that, aren't you?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. What brings you here so late?
You should probably head home -- it's already
dark out.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew... Today wore me out. I need to work out
more or something!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not that I mind the company, but shouldn't you
be working or something?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...You know, my days are always busy, but I'm
free most evenings...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, aren't you looking good this morning? I
don't know why, but the sight of your face puts
a spring in my step.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Seeing you this early in the morning always jolts
me right awake. I hope that's not bad for my
heart...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. You look busy.
<PAGE>
Don't push yourself too hard. You don't want to
wind up at the clinic by accident!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm, what is it about you? I see you smile, and
all my cares just float right away.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello. What brings you here? M-me? You
wanted to see me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Wh-what are you saying...? Oh, you're just
teasing me, aren't you?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening. All done for the day? Make sure
you get enough rest.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Well, it looks like you made it through the day
without any injuries. That's a relief.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening. It's nice to see you just before
bedtime.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Oh, I'm having sweet dreams tonight. I
mean... No, forget I said that!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Have you washed
your face?
<PAGE>
Make sure you stay sharp on the job. Don't want
to get injured!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning. Let's both do our best to work
hard and stay healthy, shall we?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning. You were smiling in your sleep,
you know.
<PAGE>
Did you have a good dream? I did. It was all
about you... And that's all I'm going to tell you
about it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you finish your work? Must've kept you
pretty busy. You didn't even talk to me once
today.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, is there something wrong?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>You haven't talked to me at all. I thought you
might be sick or something.
<PAGE>
You're okay? Well...that's good.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Your voice feels like the sun on my face in the
morning. Don't let me go without it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
If you're going to be so busy, please try to let me
know ahead of time.
<PAGE>
I kept wondering when you were going to come
talk to me... I just worry about you, that's all.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You must be tired today. Please take a hot bath
and try to relax.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You must've had a lot of work today, if it kept
you away until now...
<PAGE>
Next time you've got that much on your plate,
please let me know. I'll help you out any way I
can.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The spring sun is certainly nice...maybe a bit
TOO nice. It has a tendency to make people lazy.
Or...fidgety, at least.
<PAGE>
So don't let the weather tempt you into doing
something careless! You don't get enough sleep
as it is. We don't need you hurting yourself!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When it rains, people don't usually come out to
this clinic.
<PAGE>
I guess nobody wants to go trudging through
the rain when they're sick.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's really hot today, isn't it?
<PAGE>
Drink lots of water. It'll keep you from getting
heat stroke.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The rain's really coming down, isn't it? Be
careful not to get sick. Germs love this kind of
weather.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, nothing like the sky on a clear autumn day.
It's just wonderful to look at.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I get depressed whenever there's this much rain.
Hope it lets up soon.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's cold again today. But at least it's not raining.
That's a good thing.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's snowing, but keep your inner child on a
leash. You don't want to slip and end up at the
clinic.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Not to kill the mood or anything. Just saying it
happened to another farmer this morning.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? You came here to visit in THIS weather?
Come on, that's just careless. What if you get
hurt?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Well, since you're already here, you might as
well stay until the storm lets up.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You came trudging out here through this crazy
blizzard... You're quite a daredevil, aren't you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Well, I'm glad you didn't get hurt. Make
yourself comfortable.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's too dangerous to go out in this weather.
Let's spend some time together at home today.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's too crazy to go out in this weather. Please,
stay home today.
<PAGE>
I mean...don't you think we need to spend some
quality time as a family?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I do, at least...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Why are you grinning? You're scaring me.
<PAGE>
Hm? You're dating someone right now?
Um...congratulations. Best wishes to both of
you.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Needless to say, this restaurant's food is always
top notch...
<PAGE>
...but it's not just the food that makes the place
so popular. It's the ambiance.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to know this restaurant's specialty?
<PAGE>
Well, I think the tea is particularly excellent. It's
got a very distinct flavor, nothing like the tea I
drink at home.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mr. Otmar has been taking care of me since I
was a child.
<PAGE>
I came here to check on his back today. I'm
happy to say he's still holding up.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since you seem to be a regular at my clinic, I
figured I'd pay you a visit and see what kind of
squalor you live in to get so hurt all the time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Can't say I'm surprised by what I've found, either.
No need to make excuses! I've seen all I needed
to see...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look like the picture of health, but the
picture of health doesn't typically walk into the
clinic. What seems to be the problem?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you need something? I'm in the middle of a
conversation right now, so I'd prefer you save
this for another time, unless it's urgent...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Exercise is the key to staying healthy, and this is
a great place to walk.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you know that green is a relaxing color for
the eyes?
<PAGE>
And there's so much green around these parts,
this place must be heaven for your lovely
lookouts!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Swimming in the river is all well and good, but
please at least stretch and limber up beforehand.
I don't want to see you get a cramp and drown!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Mr. Otmar caught a ton of fish in the river the
other day.
<PAGE>
I had no idea there even were so many to catch!
<PAGE>
That means the river must be as fresh as they
come...not that that makes me feel any better
about fish.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like this place. It's so quiet. Nothing but the
sounds of animals and people commingling in
harmony...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The person in charge of a farm determines its
fate. It seems obvious, but it's important to keep
the farmer in mind when judging the land.
<PAGE>
Seeing a farm like this...just makes that even
clearer for me.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? You're asking if I can swim...? Well, I've
been playing around in the river since I was a
kid.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Learning to swim wasn't easy, though. Their
teaching methods were...demanding, to say the
least.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think fields have a way of reflecting their
farmers' character. Do you know what I mean?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Elise owns this paddy, doesn't she?
<PAGE>
My mother says we can always count on Elise
to take care of her fields.
<PAGE>
I guess she's right. As far as I see, this paddy's
very well taken care of.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, I never thought of it before, but
there's a downside to running this facility out of
my house.
<PAGE>
If someone outside of the family becomes the
next Guild Master...will I have to leave?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you ever seen this town at sunset?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You can see lights in all the houses, chimneys
alive with smoke from dinner...all mixing with
the beautiful orange sky. It's lovely!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whenever you feel even a little bit off inside,
please come visit the clinic. Don't just ignore it
and overwork yourself.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My life has been a blur since I started this
nursing career. No time for vacations...
<PAGE>
But I'd like to travel somewhere one of these
days.
<PAGE>
Besides, going out into the world and learning
new things can only make me better at my job.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When a patient needs a nurse or a doctor, we've
got to be there for them, morning, noon, or
night.
<PAGE>
It's a small town, and there's no other clinic.
We've got a huge responsibility here.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My mother's precious to me, and not just
because she's family. I really respect her as a
woman and as a Guild Master.
<PAGE>
One of my goals as I get older is to become a
woman like her.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...But, um, please don't repeat any of that. If she
found out I said it, I'd be so embarrassed...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I still have a lot to learn...
<PAGE>
But I want to help my mother with her Guild
Master duties.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Hee hee, are you cheering for me? Thank you.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I guess I'm not bad at housework.
<PAGE>
My mother was always too busy for it, so I
started helping her out when I was little.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There's something about you, some strange
power to make people feel warm and fuzzy.
<PAGE>
Whatever it is, I think it's worked on me.
<PAGE>
See, I've been thinking maybe it's not so bad to
slow down and talk to you...in fact, I kind of like
it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...I'm starting to wonder about our relationship.
Do you know what I'm trying to say?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Look, even I can tell you've been different with
me lately.
<PAGE>
If you have some problem with me, just tell me,
all right? Otherwise, we can't solve anything.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm...fairly new to dating, so I'm just going to
follow your lead, all right?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Dr. Marian just keeps on asking and asking
about you, every single day! He's hopeless...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
My patients keep telling me I've gotten prettier
since we started dating.
<PAGE>
I mean, it's probably just flattery, but people do
keep on saying it... Maybe it's true...
<PAGE>
What do you think, <MYNAME>? No, hang on,
don't answer that!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What, you want me to just come out and say
what I like about you? D-did you get hit on the
head or something?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...I mean, do you just not get that I love you so
much I can't put it into words?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Okay, all right, I like...I like that you're so thick-
headed sometimes. How's that?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Whenever you're around, and especially when
you're not, I'm always thinking about you. I don't
even know what to do about it.
<PAGE>
So...what are YOU going to do about it? You're
the one who's making me feel like this...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Every time we talk, I want to start yelling at you.
You know why, right?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Listen, we're two different people, and I know
we're not always going to see eye to eye, but...
<PAGE>
It feels like you just don't want to face up to me
these days. What do you want to do?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, are you feeling okay? You seem like
you're acting a little off these days...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When my house and the clinic were in the same
place, I was always thinking about work, no
matter what I was doing...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...but now I'm with you, I can let myself relax
sometimes. And the foot commute's not bad
either.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're smart, you're hardworking, and you're very
good at solving your own problems.
<PAGE>
But remember, I'm your wife, so please let me
help you, no matter what your burdens are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That's what married couples do, right?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now that we're married, we have so much more
time together...
<PAGE>
You and me, together forever like this... It's like a
dream, isn't it?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I'm lucky to have you. I wake up next to you
every morning, and it warms my heart every
single time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...And now that I'm saying all that out loud, my
cheeks are turning red...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I never thought we'd really be dating like this...
<PAGE>
Please don't let this be a dream, please don't let
this be a dream...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm all right now. We broke up. It happens.
Please don't feel bad about it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so glad we're back together...
<PAGE>
I feel like I lost something precious and then
found it again.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
The wedding's so close! Just thinking about it
makes me...kind of queasy, actually. Is that
weird?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, can you stop grinning like that?
<PAGE>
...What? I'm doing it too? Oh, I guess I am. Darn
mimic muscles, always ruining my poker face...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
How'd it take me so long to notice I was
pregnant? Heh. Some town nurse I am, right?
<PAGE>
Now I seriously have watch my health, for the
baby.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Would you rather have a boy or a girl?
<PAGE>
I'd like...well, I'm happy either way, but if I had
to pick, I'd like a boy who looks like you.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The baby's almost ready. I just want our child to
be healthy. That's all I ask.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
While I was pregnant, I read all about infant care,
but just reading about it doesn't mean you can
do it right.
<PAGE>
We need to keep learning every day. Let's raise
our kids the very best we can.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Our kids are crawling all over the place now. It's
so wonderful to see them grow...
<PAGE>
But it also means they're much more at risk of
hurting themselves. We have to make sure we
never take our eyes off of them.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Our children are growing up healthy, aren't they?
Every time their birthday comes around, it's like
time just keeps on flying faster and faster.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Ah, this is...<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! My
favorite tea of all.
<PAGE>
Thank you very much. I'll enjoy it later.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is... Are you sure I can have this? Wow,
this is great! Thank you very much.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh! Well, you certainly know what I like. Thank
you very much.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I, um, don't know what I did to "deserve" this,
but I'll take it if you insist...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry, I know this is going to sound
incredibly rude, but I don't really care for this
much.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...You know, I'd really appreciate it if you never
gave me this again.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R><BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>...I'm sorry. I can't eat
anything this spicy...
<PAGE>
I don't want to make you feel bad, but... Here,
let me take it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, look at that beautiful golden glow!
<PAGE>
This is too good to eat. Maybe I'll put it up on
display for a while.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, how do you even grow this? That golden
shine is just gorgeous.
<PAGE>
...Wait, you're giving it to me? Wow, thank you!
Now is not a good time for presents...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I don't need this. You should give it to
somebody else.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
How long has it been since you've talked to me?
Do you know how worried I've been? What are
you trying to do with that, buy forgiveness?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Please don't. Just put it away. I don't want any
gifts right now.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm not in the mood for a present right now.
<PAGE>
Take some time and think about what you've
done before you try to give me anything.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I really don't need this many presents in one day.
Thanks, but no thanks.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I appreciate the thought, but I can't really carry
any more right now. Please put it away, if you
wouldn't mind.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You already gave me a present today, and you've
been giving me so much so often...
<PAGE>
I wouldn't know what to give you in return.
Please, go ahead and save it for next time.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>You're giving me this for my birthday...? Thank
you very much.
<PAGE>
I'll drink it tonight before I go to bed. There's no
better end to a birthday than a nice sweet
dream!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is... You got this for my birthday?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thank you very much. I wasn't expecting
anything this nice.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You found a birthday present I like!
That's...honestly a bit of a surprise.
<PAGE>
But thank you! Thank you very much. I
appreciate it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
For me? Oh, you remembered my birthday!
Thank you very much.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Um, well... It's the thought that counts, right?
Thanks.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You know, birthday presents don't have to be
special...
<PAGE>
But shouldn't you at least avoid the things I
hate?
<PAGE>
Try to show a little more consideration next
time.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>I think this is the most...memorable present I've
ever had. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...And no, that's not a compliment. Quit smiling.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're giving me a golden crop? Are you sure
you want to give me something this precious?
<PAGE>
...A special present on my birthday, hmm?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thank you so much. You've made my birthday
very, very happy.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, look at that pretty golden glow! Wait, you're
giving me this for my birthday?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thanks so much! This is so sweet. I'll put it to
good use, too.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you like rabbits or something? I don't know if
you should be taking animals around with you...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's one of the animals from the mountains,
right? Did you catch it?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that an ermine? How did you catch it?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That ifaka's got a very cute face, don't you
think?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you hold the penguin like that, it looks like
a stuffed toy.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That monkey's not so different from us, is he? I
can understand the theory that we have a
common ancestor.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that...a parrot? Where did you bring it from?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If the animal's not complaining, I guess neither
should I...
<PAGE>
But carrying it around just doesn't seem like a
good idea.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...That Angora rabbit looks like it's staring at me.
<PAGE>
Does my face attract bunnies somehow?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a cute little chick now, but it'll be a full-
sized chicken before you know it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's fine to pet it, but if you stress it out, doesn't
that affect the harvest?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee hee, it tickles. Come on; my hand's not
that tasty.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That dog might look cute, with all the extra
chub, but there are downsides to that, you
know?
<PAGE>
Please try to keep an eye on its weight.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You want to play? Hee hee, you got me. Okay,
that's enough. Don't tug at my clothes.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dog is so fat it might get sick. You should
make it exercise more.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now isn't that a cute little kitty cat?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are fast cats, and there are fat cats, but
there are no fast, fat cats.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People say cats are good at using people, and I
guess that's true.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
